text: Ah Er Soup is the go-to spot for comforting, delicious Chinese herbal soups. The soups are flavorful, nourishing, and packed with quality ingredients. Favorites like the Buddha Jumps Over the Wall and Lotus Root Soup are a must-try. The portions are generous, and the prices are reasonable. Perfect for a healthy and hearty meal!

Came to try the Buddha Jump Over The Wall soup since it is the stall's speciality but i am disappointed. The soup is super salty and nothing like what the photos look like. Furthermore, the stall only accepts CASH and we had to walk opp to withdraw cash instead. Not coming again.....

Slurping up a nutritious bowl of soup that‚Äôs full-bodied with intense flavours and comes with generous ingredients ‚Äî chicken, mushroom, fish maw, mock abalone slice and dried oyster, to nourish my body üõå.

Buddha Jumps Over the Wall @8.50 The soup was very thick and delicious.
The olive/pumpkin rice was also good.

Love their braised pork trotter very much, tender, juicy and huge portion of meat. Its very generous portion at $7, i cooked pork trotter before so I knew the cost is almost the same or higher , not to mentioned the time needed.

Bought 5 recently to each family members.

Highly recommend their black chicken soup, watercress pork rib soup too.
